name: No Head
description:
You’ve spent your entire professional career at one of the top rated centers for medical innovation. Recently, you’ve uncovered some of the shadier aspects of your workplace, and your guilt from aiding, and continuing to aid them has led you to a life of alcohol. In a drunken stupor, you’ve figured out a way to physically live inside the alcohol you’ve come to enjoy (though you’ve only managed to detach and fit your head in a bottle). Unable to move in your new state, you accidentally spill a vial of the viler things the company has created. The virus has spreed to your colleagues, but not to you due to your new state. You must escape the facility alive to warn the world of what’s been released.

=======================================================

Controls:

WASD - Move Character

Mouse - Move Camera

Left Click - Pick Up/Attack

Right Click - Drop
